[File: aptos-core/types/src/epoch_change.rs] [Function: verify()] [Validator Sync During Transition] Can an attacker exploit the window where validators are syncing to the new epoch to commit malicious blocks? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/epoch_change.rs] [Function: verify()] [Block Production Gap] Can an attacker cause a gap in block production during epoch transitions to halt the chain? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/epoch_change.rs] [Function: verify()] [Round Number Continuity] Are round numbers reset or continued across epochs, and can this be exploited for consensus attacks? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/epoch_change.rs] [Function: verify()] [Safety Rule Persistence] Are safety rules properly carried over across epochs, or can an attacker cause validators to violate safety in the new epoch? (Critical)
